commandobject.name: StartPlayers
commandobject.documentation: Will start to export IPLR messages regularly (like synchronous batch). Can be used for continuous visualization of players moving around the map. There are three categories (see below). The default values for all category is true, that means that without attributes all the categories will be exported.

property.name: Humans
property.documentation: All human players will be exported.

property.name: GBBots
property.documentation: All GameBots bots will be exported.
